div.head: TO THE RIGHT HONORABLE both in blood and virtue; and most accomplisht LADIE, MARY, COVNTESS OF DORSET; LADY GOVERNESS to the most Illustrious, CHARLES, Prince of great BRITAIN, and IAMES, Duke of YORKE.
div.p:
I Present these Tapours to burne under the safe Protection of your honorable
Name: where, I presume, they stand secure from the Damps of Ignorance, and blasts of Censure: It is a small part of that abundant service, which my thankfull heart owes your incomparable Goodness. Be pleased to honour it with your noble Acceptance, which shall bee nothing but what your owne esteeme shall make it

closer.signed: Your Lapps. most humble servant FRA: QUARLES.
